system.description:
You have specialized in synthesizing drugs. When you succeed on the Administer First Aid action, you can also select the following options. The target never rolls a Panic test due to Synthurge.

  • Ashbone: Your target gains a +1 bonus to the damage of their melee attacks until the end of their next turn, after which they suffer 1 stress.
  • Breath of Dura: Your target recovers 1 stress but also suffers 1 damage.
  • Kambra: Your target suffers 1 stress, but takes the result of 10 on their next Panic roll within 1 minute.
  • Zulami: Your target gains two extra Action Points that they can only use for Reactive Actions in the current and in the next turn, after which they suffer 1 stress.
